auth.error.title: Authentication error
authentication.description: Login or signup via the methods below to access the platform.
authentication.expired.title: Authentication expired
login.description: Discover a platform that unifies and manages authentication for you, your users, and your applications. Supports multiple authentication methods, password resets, email verification, and more.
login.signup.description: Don't have an account? {link} to create a new account
user.created.description: Before you can login, you need to be verified by an admin
user.created.title: Created user successfully!
signup.login.description: Already have an account or want to login via Google or Microsoft? {link} with your account
name: Name
error.unexpected.description: Adventurous aren't we? Well, this is awkward. We encountered an unexpected error and it was already reported. You can try to refresh the page or contact the administrator.
error.unexpected.title: Unexpected Error
this.is.fine.image.alt: Animated picture of a dog sitting in a fire
version.mismatch.description: Frontend and backend versions differ. Please {refresh} the page.
version.mismatch.title: Version mismatch
tagline: Secure and seamless authentication made simple
login.subsection.documentation.title: Documentation
login.subsection.documentation.descripti: Learn more about the platform, API, and how to integrate it within your application
login.subsection.code.title: {name} Project
login.subsection.code.description: View the source code and contribute to the project on GitHub
